mapper.sql: id, ent_identity, ent_name, ent_document_type, ent_credit_code, registration_number, tax_registration_number, institution_code, representative, representative_type, representative_num, registered_capital, major_shareholder, business_scope, registration_authority, telephone, municipality, city, county, address, business_contact, mobile_phone, email_address, zip_code, web_site, code_file, business_license, electronic_file, person_idcard, tax_number, open_account_file, financial_file, organization_electronic_file, ent_logo
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.* FROM gyl_information t1 INNER JOIN gyl_account t2 ON t1.id=t2.information_id WHERE t2.user_id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update gyl_information
ent_identity = #{entIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ent_name = #{entName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ent_document_type = #{entDocumentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

business_scope = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registration_authority = #{registrationAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_contact = #{businessContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
